ygData.subject: Re: Anyone have any hints on starting a guild
ygData.msgSnippet: read the manual ... From: mark mark  I am looking to start a guild and need some info.... Don t know how to do it,, do I just petition?
ygData.messageBody:
read the manual

>>> "mark mark" <markerob@...> 5.19.99 12:39:40 PM >>>
From: "mark mark" <markerob@...>

I am looking to start a guild and need some info....
Don't know how to do it,, do I just petition?

any info will be appreciated,

Arathorne, Sol Ro
